description: Conversion of dwellinghouse to five flats (3 two-beds, 1 four-bed and 1 three-bed) excavation to create additional level at lower ground floor; erection of part single-storey, part two-storey rear extension at lower and upper ground floor levels; erection of terrace on rear elevation at ground floor level above portion of extension with glazed balustrades; excavation in portion of front garden to create lightwells and access areas with new stairs to upper ground level; excavation to create patio area at lower ground floor level in rear garden; removal of chimney from rear elevation and erection of two dormer extensions to main rear roof; erection of elevational alterations to front and rear; installation of cycle and refuse storage in front garden.
